item.title: Practical malware analysis: solutions for Lab 1
item.description: I am trying to acquire some knowledge on malware analysis by using ‘Practical Malware Analysis’ (by Sikorski, Michael, and Andrew Honig, 2012). I will publish my solutions of the exercises as soon as I complete them; here you can find all the executables for the labs. NOTE: I will try to use Linux utilities (such as pev, wrestool and Detect It Easy) instead of the Windows tools which are mentioned in the book.
